Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about concerns about Ayesha's whereabouts and planning to search the village together to find her and make sure she's okay @ <persona> Wolfgang Schulz
chat: Wolfgang Schulz
Hey Isabella! How's your day going so far?
Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Wolfgang! My day is going well, thank you for asking. I'm excited about my birthday party tomorrow at Hobbs Cafe, I hope you can make it!
Wolfgang Schulz
That sounds fantastic! I wouldn't miss it for the world. I'll definitely be there to celebrate with you.
Isabella Rodriguez
Thank you so much, Wolfgang! I really appreciate your support and look forward to celebrating with you!
Wolfgang Schulz
I'm looking forward to celebrating with you as well, Isabella. By the way, have you seen Ayesha around today?
Isabella Rodriguez
I haven't seen Ayesha today, have you?
Wolfgang Schulz
I haven't seen Ayesha today either. I was supposed to meet her after classes for coffee, but she hasn't shown up.
Isabella Rodriguez
We should try calling Ayesha to see if everything is alright.
Wolfgang Schulz
I agree, let's give Ayesha a call to make sure everything is okay.
Isabella Rodriguez
Let's call Ayesha right now to check on her.
Wolfgang Schulz
Let's call Ayesha right now to check on her.
Isabella Rodriguez
Let's call Ayesha right now to check on her.
Wolfgang Schulz
Let's call Ayesha right now to check on her.
Isabella Rodriguez
Let's go check around the village to see if we can find Ayesha and make sure she's okay.
Wolfgang Schulz
Let's split up and search different areas of the village to cover more ground in finding Ayesha. We can meet back here in an hour to share any updates.
Isabella Rodriguez
Let's split up and search different areas of the village to cover more ground in finding Ayesha. We can meet back here in an hour to share any updates.
